name: Project AREA - Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night, and realise that something unnatural happened...

Game was created during Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7

Controls:

WASD, arrows - move

X - action button

If you have any question please leave a comment.

Have fun!
